name: Fertilization Frenzy
description:
Player(s): 1

Platform(s): Windows, Mac, and Linux

Engine: Amulet

DESCRIPTION

CREDZ buys CROPS which generate more CREDZ, but, BUGS eat CROPS. BOTS kill BUGS, and, BUGS drop GUTZ that fertilize your CROPS.

FERTILIZATION FRENZY is a tower defense game with a focus on planting crops, protecting them, and making money. You are a farmer trying to make a humble living. But, it ain’t easy! Giant alien insects threaten your yield. The annoying chittering things don’t know that they’re also great fertilizer.

Grow your wealth by planting new crops. Protect your farm from swarms by installing FUMIGIANTS, huge mechanical anti-bug weapons. Use the bug guts as fertilizer and immediately cash in on all of your planted crops. Survive as long as you can!

FEATURES
  • It’s an isometric grid-based game, wow!
  • Cyclical ecosystem of crops, bugs, bots, and two resources.
  • A gaudy button fit for the most extreme of FarmVille[TM] grandmothers.
CREDITS

Programming: Nick Hayashi & Nick Saulnier
Music/SFX: Nick Saulnier
Art: Nick Saulnier
Animation: Nick Saulnier
Game Design: Nick Hayashi & Nick Saulnier
